title: " Beginner's Gardening Guide: Grow Your First Garden Like a Pro in Just 90 Seconds! "

subtasks: Determine gardening goals (e.g., vegetables, herbs, flowers)
Assess garden space (sunlight, soil quality, layout)
Choose climate-appropriate, easy-to-grow plants (e.g., tomatoes, basil)
Gather essential tools (trowel, hand fork, pruners, gloves, watering can)
Clear garden area of weeds and debris
Loosen soil and amend with organic matter (e.g., compost)
Decide garden type (in-ground, raised beds, containers) based on space and needs
Choose starting method (seeds or seedlings) and prepare accordingly
Plant seeds or seedlings following instructions
Water plants gently, ensuring proper irrigation (morning or late afternoon)
Apply mulch for moisture retention and weed suppression
Fertilize with organic options like compost or fish emulsion
Regularly prune and manage pests using natural remedies (e.g., neem oil)
Harvest plants when mature, paying attention to timing (e.g., morning for flowers)
